page.title: 13THE ROLE OF THE POLICE
page.content: The Policeman's job is not an easy one. His average day begins at 9 am and finishes at 5 pm. This is called{ {Day Shift.}Another shift is{Late Shift which begins at 5 pm and ends at 1 am. Every morming the police have to sign on and up_date themselves in the books with previous incidents from the night before. Most trouble is found with { {Vandalism}and {Robbery}etc, when people are out or on holiday. Most problems are found in Isolated areas, cottages and small farms. The policemen's beat takes them as far north as the Ae Village and as far South as Southerness. Their beat also takes them to areas like Glencaple and Bankend, and locally to Amisfield.
